message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.CE, cs.AI. 

The paper discusses recommendation systems, which are commonly studied in the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category. The use of deep learning techniques for modeling content and purchase intent prediction suggests that the paper may also belong to the Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-category. The use of natural language processing techniques for content-based recommendation suggests that the paper may also belong to the Computational Linguistics (cs.CL) sub-category. The focus on predicting purchase intent suggests that the paper may also belong to the Computational Economics (cs.CE) sub-category. Finally, the use of deep learning for recommendation systems suggests that the paper may also belong to the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category.
